pullRequest.title: Convert Wildfly tests to run in Docker
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #49374.
Convert the Wildfly tests to run using Docker Compose. This drastically simplifies the build setup, and will hopefully make the tests more resilient.

commit.message: Don't require a specific local port
Give the wildfly war file a specific name

nodes.bodyText: I see what you did there!

commit.message: Add missing dependency on docker build

nodes.bodyText: Why change from a String to a GString?

We should also depend on war here as well, as otherwise there's nothing to actually ensure we build the war artifact before spinning up the docker test fixture. I suspect this is why we are failing in CI here.
